original_text: Always respect your father and your mother. Then you will live for many years in the land that the Lord your God will give to you.
korean_text: 네 부모를 공경하라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와가 네게 준 땅에서 네 생명이 길리라

sentences.original_text: Always respect your father and your mother
Then you will live for many years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너는 오랫동안 살게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the land that the Lord your God will give to you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와가 네게 주는 땅에서
